q: of course. Simon Cowell , Nigel Lythgoe had a lot to say about him as well as he talks about how the show was getting to dark with Simon Cowell 's constant nasty remarks to contestants. He goes on to say I think Steven Tyler and Jennifer Lopez are both stars in their own right. You forget that we've had this train wreck that was following Simon Cowell , and then Simon Cowell disassociated himself from the show over the last few years, turned his back on the strange people they brought in to judge. So I knew it was going to be better than people expected. He adds that the show has never been about Simon Cowell and he was the one person not worried when people told him to give up on Idol after Simon Cowell 's departure. the winner.`` The X Factor'' has turned unknowns into superstars, most notably with Season 3 winner Leona Lewis in 2006. It's a trend Simon Cowell expects to continue stateside. It has to be controversial, interesting, Simon Cowell said when asked how he thinks the show will settle in stateside.`` If the U.S. show has some of the same qualities as we've done in the UK it could do really, really well.

As for Derek Hough 's attempt to set up home Stateside with the Promise This hitmaker, the friend explained to Heat: Cheryl Cole and Derek Hough have definitely been getting closer, but she wants her own life in LA- her own identity, not just as Derek Hough 's girlfriend. They added:`` She needs space and a chance to make her own life... Simon Cowell wants Cheryl Cole to be happy and he knows she'll enjoy living in his neighbourhood.''

of Pennsylvania. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said.`` You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down.
